是否X该代码源？: Do you want to {0} this code source?
是否删除该系统管理员?: Do you want to delete this system administrator?
Webhook回调所需的签名密钥: Signature key required for Webhook callback
无域名要求，能连通代码库服务即可: No domain name required, as long as the code repository service is accessible
如 github.com等，多个以英文逗号相隔: Such as github.com, separated by commas
你没有平台管理的权限，如需使用请联系平台管理员: You do not have platform management permissions. Please contact the platform administrator if needed
代码源接入后，用户可以关联对应的代码库到平台入口: After code source integration, users can associate the corresponding repository to the platform entry
OAUTH 授权时和代码库提供方交互鉴权所需的client_id: client_id required for authentication interaction with the repository provider during OAUTH authorization
OAUTH授权时和代码库提供方交互鉴权所需的client_secret: client_secret required for authentication interaction with the repository provider during OAUTH authorization
由中/英文字符、下划线、空格组成，不超过20个字符，如工蜂、GitHub: Consists of Chinese/English characters, underscores, and spaces, not exceeding 20 characters, such as 工蜂, GitHub.
请上传png、jpg、尺寸为大于128*128的正方形Logo，大小不超过2M: Please upload a png or jpg square logo with dimensions greater than 128*128, and size not exceeding 2M
由英文字母和下划线组成，不超过20个字符，作为平台服务内交互的唯一标识，如GIT: Consists of English letters and underscores, not exceeding 20 characters, serving as a unique identifier for platform service interaction, such as GIT, TGIT
Pipeline AsCode（PAC）模式下，可以使用代码库.ci目录下的YA: In Pipeline AsCode (PAC) mode, YAML files in the .ci directory of the repository can be used to arrange the pipeline, and changes to the YAML files will automatically sync to the corresponding Blue Shield pipeline.
只允许上传png、jpg: Only PNG and JPG uploads are allowed
确认离开当前页？: Are you sure to leave now?
离开将会导致未保存信息丢失: Your changes will be lost if you close without saving.
由中/英文字符、下划线组成，不超过20个字符: Consists of Chinese/English characters and underscores, up to 20 characters
由英文字母和下划线组成，不超过20个字符: Consists of English letters and underscores, up to 20 characters
如服务部署在devnet，则应启用代理，默认关闭: If the service is deployed on devnet, the proxy should be enabled; it is disabled by default.
